item.description:
1:00 - 5:00pm

* Would you like to have a relationship that is full of passion, integrity and ease?

* Are you tired of being the nice guy who doesn’t get any?

* Do you want to know what women want?

This is a course for men who desire greater authenticity, ease and erotic fire in relation with women.

* Learn practical skills for enhanced verbal and physical intimacy!

* Discover the inner key to attracting the connections you desire!

* Uncover Your authentic sexual magnetism!

* Discover the three most desirable qualities within You - (They’re not what you think!)

* And five methods to cultivate them!

Location will be emailed to registered participants. Bring cash or check if paying at the door.
item.how_to_find_us: Private location in Arlington Center will be emailed upon registration.
item.name: Embody Your Authentic Masculine Power
